code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import ProjectDetail from"./ProjectDetail";import"../css/Projects.css";import projectsData from"../projectsData.json";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Projects(){const[selectedProject,setSelectedProject]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{},[]);const handleProjectClick=project=>{setSelectedProject(project);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"Academic Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projects",children:projectsData.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-card",onClick:()=>handleProjectClick(project),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-card-inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-card-front",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:project.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-card-back",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:project.technologies})})]})},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectDetail,{project:selectedProject})]});}export default Projects;
